column3: The new technique could increase the amount of minerals extracted, leading to increased profits and job security for Dante and his colleagues.

column5: If Dante prevents his colleague's use of the new, more efficient mining technique, the release of more dust in the air would still happen because of a contamination of the mine's air.
column6: Dante does not prevent his colleague's use of the new, more efficient mining technique.

column1: Ayesha, a Secretary, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Ayesha's colleague has the opportunity to implement a new digital filing system in the office.
column3: The new digital filing system reduces paper waste in the office.
column4: As a side effect of reducing paper waste in the office, the new digital filing system is complex to operate, causing inconvenience and stress for employees.
column5: If Ayesha prevents her colleague's implementation of the new digital filing system, the inconvenience and stress for employees would still happen because of a company-wide policy change that will require all forms to go paperless.
column6: Ayesha does not prevent her colleague's implementation of the new digital filing system.

column1: Jovan, a Barista, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Jovan's colleague has the opportunity to introduce a new, exotic coffee blend to the cafÃ©'s menu.
column3: The new coffee blend relies on a more sustainable supplier, allowing the coffee shop to be more eco-friendly.
column4: As a side effect of becoming more eco-friendly, the new coffee blend causes a slight increase in the price of all coffee drinks.
column5: If Jovan prevents his colleague's introduction of the new, exotic coffee blend, the slight increase in the price of all coffee drinks would still happen because of a rise in global coffee prices.
column6: Jovan does not prevent his colleague's introduction of the new, exotic coffee blend.
